abstract: Huawei, the Chinese computer networking equipment maker, wants to penetrate the American market and is putting together the pieces to make that happen.
snippet: Huawei, the Chinese computer networking equipment maker, wants to penetrate the American market and is putting together the pieces to make that happen.
lead_paragraph: Huawei, the Chinese computer networking company that in the past has been involved in numerous controversies with American companies and the federal government, has announced an initiative to sell its products to American businesses in the United States.

headline.main: Huawei Wants to Sell to American Companies
